3971.text: A grumpy old Harrison Ford who'd rather be doing anything else.

3972.text: A homemade, cum-stained Star Trek Uniform.

3975.text: Eating a pizza that's lying in the street to gain health.

3977.text: Forgetting to eat, and consequently dying.

3978.text: Getting bitten by a radioactive spider and then battling leukemia for 30 years.

3979.text: Getting bitten by a radioactive spider and then battling leukimia for 30 years.

3982.text: Offering sexual favors for an ore and a sheep.

3984.text: Separate drinking fountains for dark elves.

3986.text: Sharpening a foam broadsword on a foam whetstone.

3987.text: Stuffing my balls into a Sega Genesis and pressing the power button.

3991.text: The collective wail of every Magic player suddenly realizing that they've spent hundreds of dollars on pieces of cardboard.

3992.text: The depression that ensues after catching 'em all.

892.text: What's the latest bullshit that's troubling this quaint fantasy town?
